Undying Enmity.name: Undying Enmity
Undying Enmity.flavor: You narrow your eyes, and even minor deities know how it feels to be prey.
Undying Enmity.target: An enemy marked by you or that is marking you
Undying Enmity.effect: You roll an extra d20 for the next attack you make and choose which die to use as the attack roll (you cannot reroll any of these attack rolls). If you are bloodied when you use this power, roll two extra d20s instead of one.
